source: おうたが寝てから向かいます
seed: I'll head there after Outa goes to sleep

casual_25.new_translation: I'll head there after Outa falls asleep

casual_50.new_translation: I'll head there once Outa's asleep

casual_75.new_translation: I'll head there after Outa crashes
casual_75.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後で行くわ

casual_100.new_translation: I'll head there after Outa crashes out

polite_25.new_translation: I will head there after Outa goes to sleep

polite_50.new_translation: I shall head there after Outa retires for the night.

polite_75.new_translation: I shall proceed there after Outa retires for the night.
polite_75.reverse_translation: おうたが就寝なさった後、そちらに向かうつもりです

polite_100.new_translation: I shall proceed thither after Outa retires for the night.
polite_100.reverse_translation: おうたが就寝なされた後、私はそこに向かうことと致しましょう

business_25.new_translation: I'll head there after Outa falls asleep
business_25.reverse_translation: おうたが寝てから向かいます

business_50.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます。

business_75.new_translation: I will head there after Outa falls asleep.
business_75.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます

business_100.new_translation: I shall proceed there after Outa has fallen asleep.
business_100.reverse_translation: おうたが眠った後、そちらに向かいます。

polite_50.new_translation: I appear to have forgotten my wallet.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 財布を忘れてしまったようです

polite_75.new_translation: It appears that I have forgotten my wallet.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 私が財布を忘れてしまったようです。

polite_100.reverse_translation: 私が財布を忘れてしまったことは明らかです

business_75.new_translation: I regret to inform you that I have forgotten my wallet.
business_75.reverse_translation: 申し訳ございませんが、財布を忘れてしまいました。

business_100.new_translation: I am writing to inform you that I have inadvertently left my wallet behind.
business_100.reverse_translation: 財布をうっかり置いてきてしまったことをお知らせいたします。

seed: Can you send it to me?

casual_25.new_translation: Could you send it to me?

casual_50.new_translation: Can you send it to me, maybe?
casual_50.reverse_translation: もしかしたら私にそれ送ってくれる？

casual_75.new_translation: Can you send it over to me, maybe?
casual_75.reverse_translation: もしかしたら私に送ってくれる？

casual_100.new_translation: Can you send it over, maybe?
casual_100.reverse_translation: もしかしたら送ってくれる？

polite_25.new_translation: Could you possibly send it to me?
polite_25.reverse_translation: それを私に送っていただけませんか？

polite_50.new_translation: Might I be able to receive it from you?

polite_100.new_translation: Might I be accorded the courtesy of receiving it from you?

business_25.reverse_translation: それを私に送っていただけませんか？

business_75.reverse_translation: あなたを抱きたいと存じます

source: 遅れてごめん、電車が止まってた
seed: Sorry I'm late, the train stopped.

casual_25.new_translation: Sorry I'm late - the train was stuck.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん、電車止まってた

casual_50.new_translation: Sorry I'm late - train was stuck.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん、電車止まってた

casual_75.new_translation: Sorry I'm late - train was bloody stuck.
casual_75.reverse_translation: ごめん遅刻 - 電車マジで止まってた

casual_100.new_translation: Sorry I'm late - the bloody train was stuck.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん - クソみたいな電車が止まってた

polite_25.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train came to a halt.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません、電車が止まりました

polite_50.new_translation: I apologize for my tardiness; the train has come to a standstill.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません。電車が止まっております。

polite_75.new_translation: I wish to apologize for my tardiness; the train has come to a complete standstill.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 遅刻のことをお詫び申し上げます。電車が完全に止まっておりました。

polite_100.new_translation: I extend my sincerest apologies for my tardiness; the train has ground to a halt.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 遅刻のことを心よりお詫び申し上げます。電車が完全に止まっておりましたので。

business_25.new_translation: I'm sorry I'm late; the train came to a halt.
business_25.reverse_translation: 遅れて申し訳ありません、電車が止まっておりました。

business_50.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train came to a halt.
business_50.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません、電車が止まっておりました。

business_75.new_translation: I would like to apologize for my tardiness; the train was brought to a stop.
business_75.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことをお詫び申し上げます。電車が止まっておりました。

business_100.new_translation: I wish to extend my sincerest apologies for my tardiness; the train was halted.
business_100.reverse_translation: 遅刻の申し訳なさについて、心からお詫び申し上げます。電車が止まっておりました。

casual_100.reverse_translation: 明日はぶっ飛ぶぜ、兄貴！

polite_75.reverse_translation: 私は明日出発するつもりです

polite_100.new_translation: I shall be taking my leave tomorrow.

business_75.new_translation: I am scheduled to depart tomorrow.
business_75.reverse_translation: 私は明日出発する予定です

business_100.new_translation: I am scheduled to depart tomorrow.
business_100.reverse_translation: 明日出発する予定です。

source: 9時半に新宿駅の南口で待ち合わせしよう

casual_100.new_translation: Let's meet up at Shinjuku Station's South Exit at 9:30, right?

polite_100.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口に9時半に参集なさいますか？

business_25.new_translation: Let's meet at 9:30 at the south exit of Shinjuku Station.
business_25.reverse_translation: 新宿駅の南口で9時半に会いましょう。

business_50.new_translation: Shall we meet at 9:30 at the south exit of Shinjuku Station?
business_50.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口で9時半に参りましょうか？

business_75.new_translation: We propose meeting at 9:30 at the south exit of Shinjuku Station.
business_75.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口にて9時半にご面会いただくことをご提案いたします。

business_100.new_translation: We would like to propose meeting at 9:30 at the south exit of Shinjuku Station.
business_100.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口にて9時半にご面会いただくことをご提案申し上げます。

source: もし時間があれば、手伝ってもらえると助かるんだけど
seed: If you have time, I'd appreciate your help.

casual_25.new_translation: If you've got time, I could use your help.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 時間があったら手伝ってくれると助かるな

casual_50.new_translation: If you've got a sec, I could really use your help.
casual_50.reverse_translation: ちょっといい？手伝ってくれたら助かる

casual_75.new_translation: If you've got a sec, I could really, really use your help.
casual_75.reverse_translation: ちょっといい？マジで手伝ってくれない？

casual_100.new_translation: If you've got a minute, I could really use your help.
casual_100.reverse_translation: ちょっといい？手伝ってくれない？

polite_25.new_translation: If you have some spare time, I would be grateful for your assistance.
polite_25.reverse_translation: お時間があれば、お助けいただければ幸いです。

polite_50.new_translation: If you have some spare time, I would appreciate your help.
polite_50.reverse_translation: もしお時間があれば、お手伝いいただければ幸いです。

polite_75.new_translation: If you have some spare time, I would be most grateful for your assistance.
polite_75.reverse_translation: もしお時間に余裕がございましたら、ご助力いただければ幸甚に存じます。

polite_100.new_translation: Should you have some spare time, I would be deeply indebted to you for your assistance.
polite_100.reverse_translation: もしお時間がございましたら、お力添えいただけますと大変感謝いたしております

business_25.new_translation: If you have some time, I would be grateful for your assistance.
business_25.reverse_translation: お時間があれば、お手伝いいただけると助かります。

business_50.new_translation: If you have some time, I would appreciate your help.
business_50.reverse_translation: お時間がおありましたら、お力添えいただければ幸いです。

business_75.new_translation: If you have some time available, I would greatly appreciate your assistance.
business_75.reverse_translation: お時間がおありましたら、大変感謝いたします。ご助力いただけますと幸いです。

business_100.new_translation: If you have some time available, I would be most grateful for your assistance.
business_100.reverse_translation: お時間がおありでしたら、ご助力いただければ幸甚に存じます。

business_50.reverse_translation: 田中さんが来週の月曜日に50人分の資料を持ってくるということである
